title: Moving charge - angle for net force E- and B-field

content.question: A positively charged particle moves with speed <math alttext="v" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math> into the region between two parallel plates. The left plate is positively charged and the right plate is negatively charged to produce an electric field with magnitude <math alttext="E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>E</mi></math>. A uniform magnetic field <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math> directed into the page exists between the plates. Which of the following is a correct equation that could be used to determine the angle <math alttext="theta" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>θ</mi></math> relative to the horizontal of the sum of forces on the particle immediately after it enters the region? Gravitational effects can be ignored.

choices.label: <math alttext="the tangent of theta equals, the fraction E over B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>E</mi><mi>B</mi></mfrac></math>
<math alttext="the tangent of theta equals, the fraction B over E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>B</mi><mi>E</mi></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the tangent of theta equals, the fraction E over v B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mi>E</mi><mrow><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>

<math alttext="the tangent of theta equals, the fraction v B over E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><mi>E</mi></mfrac></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the tangent of theta equals, the fraction v B over E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>tan</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>θ</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi>v</mi><mi>B</mi></mrow><mi>E</mi></mfrac></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
